1303840.name: HelixVision Demo
1303840.description:
HelixVision Free Demo

Preview HelixVision in your VR headset with a slideshow of stereoscopic screenshots of supported games. This is exactly how it looks while playing an actual game.

All controls are active and functional, so you can play with the screen size, curvature, and environment. Works with all VR controllers, and also with keyboard and Xbox controllers. You can pause the slideshow at any time, and skip to next slide at any time.

As a standard VR application, the demo runs on any VR headset. There are no driver, hardware, or OS restrictions for the Demo. NVidia 3D Vision is not required for the Demo.


Will work as a stereo screenshot viewer, you can add your own stereo jps files into the Stereo Pictures folder.
